articles.author: Terrence McCoy, Ana Vanessa Herrero, Samantha Schmidt
articles.title: Officials, locals undercut Trump claims about Venezuela drug boats - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump says the U.S. is blowing up boats carrying deadly fentanyl to the United States. U.S. and other officials say the route under attack carries cocaine and marijuana to Europe and Africa.
articles.content: MEXICO CITY The Trump administrations justification for blowing up suspected drug traffickers off the Venezuelan coast has been clear and consistent: These people arent just criminals; theyre narco-t… [+96 chars]
